messages.content: फाँ असिड आणि फाॕसपरस यांचा एकत्र वापर करणे योग्य आहे का हे त्यांच्या सुसंगततेवर अवलंबून आहे. काही वेळा, हे दोन्ही एकत्र वापरले जाऊ शकतात, परंतु त्यासाठी योग्य सल्ला घेणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. तुमच्या विशिष्ट परिस्थितीसाठी योग्य मार्गदर्शनासाठी, कृपया फायलोच्या CRM नंबरवर संपर्क साधा.
messages.en: Whether it is appropriate to use fon acid and phosphorus together depends on their consistency. Sometimes, both of these can be used together, but it's important to get the right advice. For appropriate guidance for your specific situation, please contact Filo's CRM number.

messages.content: 13 40 13 मध्ये 40%p आहे फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी किती दिले पाहीजे
messages.en: 13 40 13 has 40%p How much should be given to make F acid 40%
messages.standalone_question: How much should be given to make a 40% solution of formic acid from a 13 40 13 solution that is 40%?
messages.standalone_en: How much should be given to make a 40% solution of formic acid from a 13 40 13 solution that is 40%?
messages.content_transliterated: 13 40 13 madhye 40%p aahe phan acid 40% karanyasathi kiti dile pahije

messages.content:
फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी तुम्हाला 13-40-13 यामध्ये असलेल्या फाँ असिडच्या प्रमाणानुसार गणना करावी लागेल. 

तुमच्याकडे 13-40-13 मध्ये 40% फाँ असिड आहे, म्हणजे तुम्हाला 40% फाँ असिड मिळवण्यासाठी तुम्हाला 40% प्रमाणात फाँ असिडची मात्रा वाढवावी लागेल.

तुम्हाला किती फाँ असिड आवश्यक आहे हे जाणून घेण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला तुमच्या सध्याच्या फाँ असिडच्या प्रमाणानुसार गणना करावी लागेल. 

कृपया तुम्हाला किती एकर किंवा क्षेत्रफळ आहे ते सांगा, जेणेकरून मी तुम्हाला अधिक अचूक गणना देऊ शकेन.
messages.en:
To increase Fon acid to 40%, you have to calculate the amount of f acid in 13-40-13. 

You have 40% fon acid in 13-40-13, which means that you have to increase the amount of fn acid by 40% to get 40% f acid.

To know how much fon acid you need, you need to calculate your current amount of fan acid. 

Please tell me how many acres or area you have, so I can give you a more accurate calculation.
32 Folds
messages.standalone_question: How much phosphoric acid is needed to achieve a 40% concentration for an area of 32 acres?
messages.standalone_en: How much phosphoric acid is needed to achieve a 40% concentration for an area of 32 acres?

messages.content:
तुम्हाला 32 गुठे (32 acres) क्षेत्रफळासाठी फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी आवश्यक प्रमाण काढण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला 13-40-13 च्या सध्याच्या प्रमाणानुसार गणना करावी लागेल.

तुमच्या 32 गुठे क्षेत्रासाठी, तुम्हाला किती फाँ असिड आवश्यक आहे हे जाणून घेण्यासाठी, कृपया तुमच्या सध्याच्या फाँ असिडच्या प्रमाणानुसार गणना करावी लागेल. 

तुमच्या 13-40-13 च्या प्रमाणानुसार, तुम्हाला 40% फाँ असिड मिळवण्यासाठी आवश्यक प्रमाण काढण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला अधिक माहिती आवश्यक आहे. 

कृपया तुमच्या 13-40-13 च्या सध्याच्या प्रमाणाची माहिती द्या, म्हणजे मी तुम्हाला अधिक अचूक गणना देऊ शकेन.
messages.en:
To get the amount you need to increase f acid to 40% for an area of 32 bunches (32 acres), you have to calculate the current ratio of 13-40-13.

For your 32 bunch area, to know how much fon acid you need, please calculate your current amount of fon acid. 

Depending on your ratio of 13-40-13, you need more information to extract the amount you need to get 40% f acid. 

Please inform your current ratio of 13-40-13, so that I can give you a more accurate calculation.

messages.standalone_en: What is the current concentration of the 13-40-13 fertilizer?

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

messages.content: फाँ 40% काय देऊण वाडवावी
messages.en: F 40% what to give
messages.standalone_question: What should be added to achieve 40% phosphoric acid?
messages.standalone_en: What should be added to achieve 40% phosphoric acid?

messages.content:
फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी तुम्हाला 13-40-13 या मिश्र खतामध्ये फाँ असिडचे प्रमाण वाढवावे लागेल. 

तुमच्या 32 गुठे क्षेत्रासाठी, तुम्हाला आवश्यक असलेल्या फाँ असिडच्या प्रमाणाची गणना करण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला खालील माहिती आवश्यक आहे:

1. तुमच्या सध्याच्या 13-40-13 च्या प्रमाणात फाँ असिडचे प्रमाण.
2. तुम्हाला किती प्रमाणात फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी आवश्यक आहे.

सामान्यतः, तुम्हाला 40% फाँ असिड मिळवण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला 13-40-13 च्या प्रमाणात फाँ असिडची मात्रा वाढवावी लागेल. 

कृपया तुमच्या सध्याच्या फाँ असिडच्या प्रमाणाची माहिती द्या, म्हणजे मी तुम्हाला अधिक अचूक गणना देऊ शकेन.
messages.en:
To increase Fon acid to 40%, you have to increase the amount of Fan acid in the mixed fertilizer 13-40-13. 

For your 32 bunch area, to calculate the amount of fon acid you need, you need the following information:

1. The amount of F acid in your current ratio of 13-40-13.
2. How much fon acid do you need to increase to 40%?

In general, to get 40% of the fon acid, you'll need to increase the amount of fan acid in a ratio of 13-40-13. 

Please provide information about your current amount of fon acid, so that I can give you a more accurate calculation.

messages.content: फाँ किती दिले पाहीजे
messages.en: How much should I pay
messages.standalone_question: How much acid should be added?
messages.standalone_en: How much acid should be added?

messages.content:
फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी तुम्हाला 13-40-13 या मिश्र खतामध्ये किती फाँ असिड आवश्यक आहे हे जाणून घेण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला खालील माहिती आवश्यक आहे:

1. तुमच्या सध्याच्या 13-40-13 च्या मिश्रणात फाँ असिडचे प्रमाण.
2. तुम्हाला किती एकर किंवा गुठे क्षेत्रफळ आहे.

तुमच्या 32 गुठे क्षेत्रासाठी, तुम्हाला फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी आवश्यक प्रमाण काढण्यासाठी, कृपया तुमच्या सध्याच्या फाँ असिडच्या प्रमाणाची माहिती द्या. 

तुमच्या सध्याच्या मिश्रणात फाँ असिडचे प्रमाण दिल्यास, मी तुम्हाला आवश्यक प्रमाण सांगू शकेन.
messages.en:
To know how much f acid you need in a mixed fertilizer of 13-40-13 to make fon acid 40%, you need the following information:

1. The amount of F acid in your current mixture of 13-40-13.
2. How many acres or bunches of area do you have?

For your 32 bunch area, please report your current amount of fon acid to extract the amount you need to make 40% of fon acid. 

If you give the amount of f acid in your current mixture, I can tell you the required amount.

messages.standalone_question: How much fertilizer should be added to achieve 40% phosphorus acid?
messages.standalone_en: How much fertilizer should be added to achieve 40% phosphorus acid?

messages.content:
जर तुम्हाला 80% फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी आवश्यक प्रमाण काढायचे असेल, तर तुम्हाला 13-40-13 च्या मिश्रणात फाँ असिडचे प्रमाण वाढवावे लागेल.

तुमच्या 32 गुठे क्षेत्रासाठी, तुम्हाला 80% फाँ असिड 40% करण्यासाठी आवश्यक प्रमाण काढण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला खालील गणना करावी लागेल:

1. **सध्याचे प्रमाण:** 13-40-13 मध्ये 40% फाँ असिड आहे.
2. **आवश्यक प्रमाण:** तुम्हाला 80% फाँ असिड मिळवण्यासाठी आवश्यक प्रमाण काढा.

तुमच्या सध्याच्या मिश्रणात फाँ असिडचे प्रमाण दिल्यास, मी तुम्हाला आवश्यक प्रमाण सांगू शकेन. 

कृपया तुमच्या 13-40-13 च्या सध्याच्या प्रमाणाची माहिती द्या, म्हणजे मी तुम्हाला अधिक अचूक गणना देऊ शकेन.
messages.en:
If you want to remove the required amount to increase 80% fan acid to 40%, you will have to increase the amount of fan acid in the mixture of 13-40-13.

For your 32 bunch of areas, to extract the amount you need to make 80% f acid 40%, you'll need to make the following calculation:

1. **Current ratio:** 13-40-13 contains 40% F acid.
2. **Required quantity:** Extract the amount you need to get 80% of the acid.

If you give the amount of f acid in your current mixture, I can tell you the required amount. 

Please inform your current ratio of 13-40-13, so that I can give you a more accurate calculation.

messages.standalone_question: What steps should we take to control that?
messages.standalone_en: What steps should we take to control that?

messages.content:
To control diseases and pests during the seedling stage, you can follow these measures:

### For Diseases:
1. **Collar Rot, Damping Off, Seedling Blight:**
   - Drench or spray seedlings with **Carbendazim** at a concentration of **2.5g/liter**.

### For Pests:
1. **Ants, Termites, Root Aphids, Thrips, Internal Borers:**
   - Drench or spray seedlings with **Chlorpyriphos** at a concentration of **5mL/liter** or **Thiamethoxam** at **0.5g/liter**.

### Additional Measures:
- **Seed Treatment:** Use good quality seeds and treat them with insecticides, fungicides, and biological agents to improve germination and protect against diseases and pests.
- **Soil Health:** Ensure good soil health by maintaining proper moisture and nutrient levels.

Implementing these measures will help in effectively controlling diseases and pests during the seedling stage.
messages.en:
To control diseases and pests during the seedling stage, you can follow these measures:

### For Diseases:
1. **Collar Rot, Damping Off, Seedling Blight:**
   - Drench or spray seedlings with **Carbendazim** at a concentration of **2.5g/liter**.

### For Pests:
1. **Ants, Termites, Root Aphids, Thrips, Internal Borers:**
   - Drench or spray seedlings with **Chlorpyriphos** at a concentration of **5mL/liter** or **Thiamethoxam** at **0.5g/liter**.

### Additional Measures:
- **Seed Treatment:** Use good quality seeds and treat them with insecticides, fungicides, and biological agents to improve germination and protect against diseases and pests.
- **Soil Health:** Ensure good soil health by maintaining proper moisture and nutrient levels.

Implementing these measures will help in effectively controlling diseases and pests during the seedling stage.

The analysis of your crop image shows the following:

1. **Leaf Condition**: Some leaves are yellowing, which may indicate nutrient deficiencies or stress.
2. **Fruit Development**: The fruits are in the early stages of development, but the overall health of the plant could impact their growth.

For a more accurate assessment, a clearer image focusing on specific areas of concern (like close-ups of the leaves or fruits) would be beneficial. If you suspect any specific diseases or pests, I can provide spray recommendations based on the crop type and stage. Let me know how you'd like to proceed!
